20110120233109.000|20110120233111.000|CC1|IS TODAY BACK TOGETHER WITH HER 
20110120233111.000|20110120233112.000|CC1|DAUGHTER.

20110120233114.000|20110120233117.000|CC1|CASE AND A MOM WHO NEVER GAVE

20110120233126.000|20110120233128.000|CC1|>> I JUST ALWAYS BELIEVED THAT

20110120233129.000|20110120233131.000|CC1|>> THIS IS ALWAYS WOULD I       
20110120233131.000|20110120233131.000|CC1|WANTED.                         
20110120233131.000|20110120233132.000|CC1|>> THE HEARTBREAKING STORY      
20110120233132.000|20110120233135.000|CC1|BEGINS ON AUGUST 4th, 1987,     
20110120233135.000|20110120233136.000|CC1|WHEN BABY CARLINA WHITE WAS     
20110120233136.000|20110120233137.000|CC1|SNATCHED FROM A NEW YORK CITY   
20110120233137.000|20110120233139.000|CC1|HOSPITAL BY A STRANGER POSING   
20110120233139.000|20110120233140.000|CC1|AS A NURSE.                     
20110120233140.000|20110120233142.000|CC1|IT WAS FRONT PAGE NEWS AS       
20110120233142.000|20110120233144.000|CC1|CARLINA'S PARENTS BEGGED THE    
20110120233144.000|20110120233145.000|CC1|KIDNAPPER TO RETURN THEIR BABY. 
20110120233145.000|20110120233150.000|CC1|>> JUST GIVE ME MY BABY BACK,   
20110120233150.000|20110120233151.000|CC1|PLEASE.                         
20110120233151.000|20110120233152.000|CC1|>> "INSIDE EDITION" SPOKE TO    
20110120233152.000|20110120233154.000|CC1|CARLINA'S MOM, JOY WHITE, IN    
20110120233154.000|20110120233154.000|CC1|1991.                           
20110120233154.000|20110120233156.000|CC1|SHE WAS STILL MOURNING THE LOSS 
20110120233156.000|20110120233156.000|CC1|OF HER DAUGHTER.                
20110120233156.000|20110120233200.000|CC1|>> I JUST HOPE THAT WHOEVER HAS 
20110120233200.000|20110120233202.000|CC1|HER GIVES HER THE LOVE THAT I   
20110120233202.000|20110120233205.000|CC1|WOULD GIVE HER IF SHE WAS HERE  
20110120233205.000|20110120233206.000|CC1|WITH ME, AND TAKE CARE OF HER.  
20110120233206.000|20110120233208.000|CC1|>> NOW WE KNOW WHAT HAPPENED TO 
20110120233208.000|20110120233208.000|CC1|CARLINA.                        
20110120233208.000|20110120233211.000|CC1|SHE WAS TAKEN TO BRIDGEPORT,    
20110120233211.000|20110120233212.000|CC1|CONNECTICUT, JUST 45 MILES      
20110120233212.000|20110120233215.000|CC1|AWAY, AND RENAMED NADRA NANCE.  
20110120233215.000|20110120233216.000|CC1|SHE SAYS SHE WAS ABUSED BY THE  
20110120233216.000|20110120233218.000|CC1|WOMAN WHO TOOK HER AND NEVER    
20110120233218.000|20110120233220.000|CC1|FELT THAT SHE BELONGED.         
20110120233220.000|20110120233221.000|CC1|CARLINA ACTUALLY CRACKED THE    
20110120233221.000|20110120233223.000|CC1|CASE HERSELF BY GOING ON THE    
20110120233223.000|20110120233224.000|CC1|WEBSITE FOR THE CENTER FOR      
20110120233224.000|20110120233225.000|CC1|MISSING AND EXPLOITED CHILDREN. 
20110120233225.000|20110120233227.000|CC1|SHE WAS SHOCKED TO FIND HER     
20110120233227.000|20110120233229.000|CC1|BABY PHOTO AS WELL AS A         
20110120233229.000|20110120233231.000|CC1|COMPOSITE OF HOW SHE WOULD LOOK 
20110120233231.000|20110120233232.000|CC1|AT AGE 19.                      
20110120233232.000|20110120233234.000|CC1|THERE WAS AN UNCANNY            
20110120233234.000|20110120233236.000|CC1|RESEMBLANCE TO HER OWN FACE.    
20110120233236.000|20110120233238.000|CC1|>> SHE CALLED OUR NATIONAL      
20110120233238.000|20110120233238.000|CC1|MISSING CHILDREN'S HOTLINE.     
20110120233238.000|20110120233240.000|CC1|WE REACHED OUT TO THE NEW YORK  
20110120233240.000|20110120233242.000|CC1|CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT WHO HAD  
20110120233242.000|20110120233245.000|CC1|BEEN INVESTIGATING HER          
20110120233245.000|20110120233247.000|CC1|DISAPPEARANCE SINCE 1987, AND   
20110120233247.000|20110120233249.000|CC1|NYPD TOOK A DNA SAMPLE AND      
20110120233249.000|20110120233251.000|CC1|ALERTED HER AND US THAT SHE     
20110120233251.000|20110120233252.000|CC1|WAS, IN FACT, CARLINA WHITE.    
20110120233252.000|20110120233254.000|CC1|>> THE FRONT PAGE OF TODAY'S    
20110120233254.000|20110120233257.000|CC1|NEW YORK POST READS "FOUND."    
20110120233257.000|20110120233258.000|CC1|CARLINA AND HER PARENTS ARE     
20110120233258.000|20110120233301.000|CC1|HERE AT THE HE IS SEX HOUSE

20110120233304.000|20110120233307.000|CC1|THEY WERE FORCED TO SPEND
